alert.note: Alert for Toole (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 6:43PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Toole County through 745 PM MDT... At 642 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kevin to 9 miles northwest of Shelby. Movement was southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kevin, Oilmont and Ferdig. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 371 and 381. Highway 2 between mile markers 270 and 274. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
